name: Mercenary's Mission IV
description: With it, adventurer of Base 1-110 can immediately complete a mission they accept from the Mission Board! [The old cowhide envelope is like a vow. "It symbolizes the ultimate death mercenary group lurking in the darkness for thousands of years. It seems that any task will be completed at once if you pay them well..." Of course~ It's used to scare children who don't want to sleep at night. Mysterious mercenary troop is now serving the justice of the adventurers. ]

name: Merchant's Bank Premium
description: It's been 15 years since CMB issued its first credit card. And Ragnarok RO is celebrating is first 6 months after going online. This meaningful cooperation has also brought exclusive special offers to players.

name: Mercury
description: This liquid metal that an alchemist accidentally made when refining an old potion can be used to make materials for equipment.

name: Merlin's Gift
description: Kerry, the thief, declared that he would steal the dagger of Merlin, the Warlock, but always failed because Merlin was too astute to cheat. As he wanted to give up, he got a secret present from Merlin. Merlin gave his dagger to Kerry. From then on, the dagger always stayed with Kerry till Fagris, the legendary robber, stole it. After that, the dagger was never found. (Better used as the weapon skin)

name: Merry Christmas Hat
description: A common plush hat during Christmas, Christmas Kids also added some special patterns on it. (this product is available only in Christmas season)

name: Metal Armor [1]
description: A robe designed for easy movement. Sexy clothes for women to wear.

name: Metal Axe [1]
description: A powerful axe will grow by absorbing the spiritual air of heaven and earth.

name: Metal Axe [2]
description: A powerful axe will grow by absorbing the spiritual air of heaven and earth.

name: Metal Bow
description: An arrow used by orc archers. It takes a lot of efforts to pull the string.
